import React from 'react'; import ScrollAnimation from 'react-animate-on-scroll'; import { Row, Container, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { LookModal } from './LookModal'; import { PlanModal } from './PlanModal'; import { CollabModal } from './CollabModal'; import { InclusivityModal } from './InclusivityModal'; export const Process = () => { return ( <>

HOW I THINK ABOUT DESIGN
Look, listen, learn

I strive to clearly define design solutions through interviews and research. The first step is always to fully understand the problem that needs to be solved.

Look, listen, learn

I strive to clearly define design solutions through interviews and research. The first step is always to fully understand the problem that needs to be solved.

Plan, create, test

I thrive in the planning phase of a project, and use visuals to create and test everything, from brainstorming sessions to wireframing and prototyping.

Collaboration and Iteration

The best design work happens through a collaborative effort with stakeholders, users, and within the design team. Constant testing and communication from the beginning of a project lead to positive outcomes.

Inclusivity

I am very interested in inclusive design. I strive to do work that is accessible to all people. I celebrate differences in humans and I believe there is no typical user.

) }
